channel.title: RS Remake
channel.description:
[center]This is gonna be based off of project insanity.
The main spots we need filled are: Server Developers Client Developers Web Designer( I have all the files from the 2007 site just need someone to make into a site.)
Goals: Have a stable server Have every NPC Make this fun and enjoyable for everyone Remake every quest All shops as runescape
[u]Total Progress:[/u] Tutorial Island Lumbridge is like 80% done Fully clipped firemaking Woodcutting Mining Runecrafting Agility Cooking Fishing Fletching Herblore Thieving Fully working bank pin
[u]Random Events[/u] Drill Demon Evil Chicken Freaky Forester Spirit Tree Zombie Random(when burying bones) [/center]
[center][size=18pt]Media:[/size] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/6rn7mb.png[/img]
Zombie Random Event(burying bones) [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2vn27x2.png[/img]
Fully working pins [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2lbdni9.png[/img]
I finally got alching working but for some reaon it uses waters also [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/1493420.png[/img]
Fully working Firemaking Clipped [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/117y839.png[/img]
Cooking with full dialogues [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2v0kbac.png[/img][/center]
[size=36pt]There is much much more just not posted. [center]You can contact me at wrigley999@ymail.com[/center][/size]
Please apply in the following format: [code]Name: What are you applying for: Experience: MSN: Any Proof of some work: Any additional info we should know:[/code]

item.description:
@lugmfr wrote:

Name: Justin
What are you applying for: Web design/server coder
Experience: I’ve had my own old-school remake I released.
MSN: teh_service@live.com
Any Proof of some work: I’ll give you link to my release on MSN due to advertisement issues
Any additional info we should know: I can be active the majority of the day unless I’m going to do something. I’m not illiterate or retarted, I’m also easy to get along with. Feel free to contact me.

item.title: RS Remake
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“pk2play, post:34, topic:392001”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=489164.msg3603766#msg3603766 date=1305873145]
“project insanity”

Stopped reading.

If you’re going to make a remake, use a base that doesn’t suck horribly :\

Also, there’s already a fairly good remake going by the name RS Remake. How much of the 2007 website do you have, exactly? Do you have the message centre? Because if you do then you either leeched it from me or RS Remake, because we both had to make those pages - and many others - by hand from looking at screenshots.
[/quote]
I have the original so hop off me.[/quote]

You don’t have the original message centre, because no one has the original message centre.

Read full topic
